title: Winter storm forecast: carry tire chains and be prepared for road closures
description: Tire chain requirements and road closures are possible through Saturday, December 27, due to a forecast of heavy rain and snow. Call 209/372-0200 (then 1, 1) for current road status within Yosemite National Park.

title: Tioga Road (Hwy 120 through the park) and Glacier Point Road are closed
description: Tioga Road (continuation of Highway 120 through the park) and Glacier Point Road are closed for the season due to snow. Snow is possible on other roads; be prepared for tire chain requirements and other road closures. Call 209/372-0200 (then 1, 1) to check road conditions.
